alert.note: Alert for Becker; Clay; Otter Tail; Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 8:24PM CDT until May 30 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Clay County in northwestern Minnesota... Western Otter Tail County in west central Minnesota... Wilkin County in west central Minnesota... Southwestern Becker County in northwestern Minnesota... Southeastern Cass County in southeastern North Dakota... Central Richland County in southeastern North Dakota... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 823 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles north of Wyndmere to 6 miles west of Lawndale to near Fergus Falls, moving north at 55 mph. At 820 PM CDT, 59 mph winds were reporting 6 miles north of Wahpeton. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Lawndale around 825 PM CDT. Fergus Falls around 830 PM CDT. Barnesville and Baker around 835 PM CDT. Barrie, Edwards and Downer around 840 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Kindred, Maplewood State Park and Rollag. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 14 and 68. Interstate 94 in North Dakota between mile markers 334 and 352. Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 1 and 60. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
